titleStmt.title: The Life of H.H. with the relation at large of what passed betwixt him and the taylors wife in Black-friars, according to the original : likewise particular remarks of his behaviour ever since, which proves (tho times change) him to be the same H.H. still.
titleStmt.author: Hills, Henry, d. 1689?

titleStmt.title: The Life of H.H. with the relation at large of what passed betwixt him and the taylors wife in Black-friars, according to the original : likewise particular remarks of his behaviour ever since, which proves (tho times change) him to be the same H.H. still.
titleStmt.author: Hills, Henry, d. 1689?

notesStmt.note: Caption title: The prodigal returned to his Father's house.
"A premonition to the reader from the hand of a friend" (p. [5]) dated and signed: July 15, 1672. Daniel King.
Dedicatory epistle (p. [11]) signed and dated: Henry Hills ... Jan. 28, 1650.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
